column4: hi, I can't adjust my time through System->Admin->Time and Date... how come?!?! it tells me that I don't have permission, but it doesn't even ask for a password.  How can I change it from the command line... and isn't there a ntp daemon anyway??
try right/left clicking on the calender
same thing, "The configuration could not be loaded.  You are not allowed to access the system configuration."
